backend/AltSignup.mo: Simple signup handler performing basic username/password validation and returning a simulated success response.
backend/main.mo: Primary backend actor managing RBAC checks, user onboarding profiles, and an alternate signup method stub.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Existing summaries of multiple frontend files for reference or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring Internet Identity URL and loading the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Defines allowed alternative origins for Internet Identity derivation.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects all unknown routes to index.html.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with RootLayout and all app routes including signup, login, onboarding, and test variants.
frontend/src/auth/iiConfig.ts: Shared Internet Identity configuration utilities providing AuthClient creation and login options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthDiagnos: Debug panel showing detailed auth status, timing, stall detection, and platform info when debugAuth is enabled.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthErrorPa: Error UI component displaying a message with optional Retry and Return-to-Landing buttons.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPopupHe: Guidance panel explaining popup issues during II login with a Retry button and direct II link.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Status banner showing current auth step, timing, outcomes, and suggested actions including retry and II link.
frontend/src/components/auth/CanisterWar: Banner indicating backend warmup state with messages for warming, ready, or failed modes and retry support.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Handler for II authorize callbacks that checks onboarding status and redirects accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/PatchedInte: Wrapper loading II config before instantiating InternetIdentityProvider for safe environment setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/UsernamePas: Empty placeholder file for a username/password auth form.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Root layout wrapping all pages with onboarding context and II callback handler.
frontend/src/components/TaskModal.tsx: Task timer modal with start/pause/resume logic and completion handling.
frontend/src/config/ai.ts: Deprecated AI config returning static values and warning to use proxy instead.
frontend/src/contexts/OnboardingResultCo: React context storing onboarding answers and AI-generated results with provider and hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthAttemptGuard.t: Hook managing auth attempt lifecycle with flags, timestamps, correlation IDs, and reset helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthFlowDiagnostic: Tracks auth flow steps, timing, and outcomes with logging and slow‑step detection for diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanisterWarmup.ts: Manages a warmup process for a canister actor with timeout handling, retry logic, and concurrency guards.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity restoration, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentitySi: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useMobileInternetIden: Implements mobile‑safe II login with pre‑initialized AuthClient and structured result handling for popup and cancellation errors.
Patched mobile II login hook using shared configuration and structured outcome handling with pre‑initialized AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordIdentity.t: Provides username/password‑based identity context with storage persistence, restoration, and lifecycle management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostAuthTimeout.ts: React hook that manages phase-based post-authentication timeouts, tracks elapsed time, and triggers a callback on timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useStalledAuthDetecti: Hook that detects stalled authentication steps by tracking elapsed time and comparing it against per-step thresholds.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining the app’s color tokens, typography, and dark theme using a chocolate-inspired palette.
frontend/src/lib/aiClient.ts: Legacy AI client that is disabled and throws an error if used.
frontend/src/lib/aiProxyClient.ts: Proxy client for calling external AI endpoints with validation, typed responses, and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/onboardingPlaceholder.t: Empty placeholder module for onboarding-related logic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Daily.tsx: Daily steps page that loads AI-generated tasks, shows loading and error states, and displays selectable tasks with a modal.
frontend/src/pages/Fridge.tsx: Fridge page showing hardcoded chocolate inventory with period toggles and simple UI cards.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature carousel modal, and navigation buttons for signup and login.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Complex Internet Identity login flow handling validation, timeouts, platform quirks, and redirecting after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Multi‑step onboarding form that validates access, collects goal inputs, generates an AI onboarding plan, and stores results in context.
frontend/src/pages/Signup.tsx: Signup page implementing Internet Identity authentication with diagnostics, stall detection, and redirect after identity validation.
frontend/src/pages/SignupTest.tsx: Simplified backup signup page that triggers Internet Identity login and redirects to onboarding when ready.
frontend/src/pages/SweetSummit.tsx: Displays the AI‑generated onboarding plan, including big goal and first weekly mountain, or redirects if no data exists.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklyMountain.tsx: Fetches and displays a weekly AI-generated plan, caching results per week and handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/utils/authDiagnostics.ts: Provides correlated auth logging, step tracking, and diagnostic utilities for authentication flows.
frontend/src/utils/identityValidation.ts: Validates identities and determines whether a session is stale based on delegation and anonymity checks.
frontend/src/utils/passwordIdentity.ts: Generates deterministic Ed25519 identities from credentials and provides storage, restoration, and clearing utilities.
frontend/src/utils/platform.ts: Detects Chrome on Android and caches platform info for safe Internet Identity flows.
frontend/src/utils/safeRender.ts: Safely converts AI-provided values to strings and extracts validated string fields to prevent rendering errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS themes, colors, typography, and animations with custom extensions and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s schema version, current state version, and a detailed list of implemented backend and frontend features. Captures RBAC, onboarding logic, API behaviors, and overall app architecture for build planning.
